id: A Productive Notion Daily Planner (2023 Version)
name: A Productive Notion Daily Planner (2023 Version)
description: I loved using my previous Notion Weekly Planner but having to create a new page for each week started to a little annoying after 2 years.I made a few structural tweaks but kept the core elements, enjoy!If you have questions you can watch me go through it in detail here.Check out my full Notion course: Build Your Command Center in Notion.
